page.title: 06INTERESTING HOBBIES
page.content: A study of 35 households in the village of Tremeirchion was carried out by the children of the village school. One question asked was 'Do you have any hobbies or interests? If so what are they?'The results were as follows:- The most popular hobby was gardening,14 people enjoyed gardening, 10 people enjoyed craft ,things like knitting or sewing, 9 people enjoyed reading, 5 people enjoyed music, 4 people enjoyed sport, 2 people enjoyed house maintinence, 2 people enjoyed politics, 2 people enjoyed horseriding,2 people enjoyed car and bike maintinence, 1 person enjoyed travelling,1 person enjoyed walking, 1 person enjoyed 'MERCHED Y WAWR', 1 person enjoyed flower arranging, and 1 person enjoyed bee keeping. We thought that bee keeping was the most interesting hobby.
